# Preface {.unnumbered}

Welcome to Document Lens, a desktop application for batch PDF analysis of corporate reports using research frameworks like TCFD, GRI, SDGs, and SASB.

This manual covers all features of the application, from basic document import to advanced analysis workflows.

## Who This Manual Is For

- Sustainability researchers analyzing corporate annual reports
- Academic researchers studying disclosure patterns
- Analysts comparing company reporting across frameworks
- Anyone working with large collections of PDF documents

## How to Use This Manual

- **User Guide**: Start here for core concepts and basic workflows
- **Quick Reference**: Fast lookup for common tasks
- **Analysis Workflows**: Step-by-step examples for research scenarios
- **Collaboration**: Sharing projects with colleagues

## Getting Help

- **In-App Help**: Press `Cmd/Ctrl + /` or click help icons throughout the app
- **GitHub Issues**: [Report bugs or request features](https://github.com/michaelborck-education/document-lens-desktop/issues)
